# endLocation

**Instance Property**

The ending location of the text range.

## Declaration

```swift
var endLocation: any NSTextLocation { get }
```

## Characteristics of the text range

- **location**: The starting location of the text range.
- **isEmpty**: Returns whether the text range is empty.
